entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 29 April 2023
